title: Document Changelog & Version
content:
## Section 3: Document Changelog & Version

### Version 1.0.0 (December 1, 2025)

**Initial Release** - Complete master design system documentation

#### What's Included:
- ✅ Complete color system with 7 format variants per color
- ✅ Typography system (9 sizes, 5 weights, 6 line heights)
- ✅ Spacing & layout tokens (8pt grid)
- ✅ 20+ animation keyframes with specifications
- ✅ 12 core UI components with exhaustive docs
- ✅ Fintech workflow patterns (Settlement, Reconciliation, KYC, etc.)
- ✅ Data formatting standards (Currency, Date, Masking)
- ✅ Validation rules with regex patterns
- ✅ Code generation templates
- ✅ Decision trees for component selection
- ✅ Accessibility requirements (WCAG 2.2 AA)

#### Coverage:
- **Design Tokens**: 500+ color variants, typography scales, spacing values
- **Components**: 100+ components documented
- **Workflows**: 6 complete fintech workflows
- **Code Examples**: 100+ production-ready code snippets

#### Future Enhancements:
- [ ] Add more code examples for complex patterns
- [ ] Include Figma design file integration
- [ ] Add video tutorials for key workflows
- [ ] Expand testing pattern library

### Breaking Changes Log

**None** - This is the initial release

### Deprecation Notices

**None** - All patterns are current and supported

---
